resources.string:
I am Anirudh Padma currently doing masters in Computer Science at Pace University.
Research Interests: My interests focuses on natural language processing (NLP), particularly in the development of dialogue systems for human-computer interaction. I am interested in creating AI agents that can engage in meaningful and informative conversations, understanding user intent and adapting to different contexts.


Prior Experience: I did my undergraduate education at Vardhaman College of Engineering in Hyderabad, where my major was in Electronics and Communication Engineering.


Skills and Awards: I am proficient enough in Python, Java, and C programming languages.


Additional Information: In my free time, I enjoy playing board games, basket ball and volunteering at a local animal shelter.
My Hobbies are playing chess, listening to music, playing piano, drawing and cooking.
